name: MTGfan
0:
”Alexa Open M.T.G. Fan”
”Alexa Ask M.T.G. Fan For Some Text”
”Alexa Ask M.T.G. Fan For A Quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. t. g. fan
des: Activating skill causes Alexa to read a random quote from a compilation of the best Magic The Gathering flavor texts. This skill is unofficial/not authorized by Wizards of the Coast
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
